Navigation
Name Test/Libraries/util/Eval/shell
Synopsis Execute a string containing Rascal commands and return the output of the RascalShell.
Function
  1. list[str] shell(str commands)
  2. list[str] shell(list[str] commands)
  3. list[str] shell(str commands, int duration)
  4. list[str] shell(list[str] commands, int duration)
Usage import util::Eval;
Description Given a single string containing command, or a list of strings containing successive lines with commands, the commands are fed into the RascalShell and the output is returned as a list of strings. An optional duration argument may be present to limit the time (in milliseconds) the execution may take. By default, the duration is set to 1000 ms.
Examples 
rascal>import util::Eval;
PROFILE: 1 data points, 60 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1      60   100.0%  |prompt:///|(0,18,<1,0>,<1,18>
ok
rascal>shell("2 * 3");
PROFILE: 2 data points, 9 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       8    88.9%  |prompt:///|(6,7,<1,6>,<1,13>)
prompt:///          1       1    11.1%  |prompt:///|(0,14,<1,0>,<1,14>
PROFILE: 2 data points, 9 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1       8    88.9%  |prompt:///|(6,7,<1,6>,<1,13>)
prompt:///          1       1    11.1%  |prompt:///|(0,14,<1,0>,<1,14>
list[str]: ["rascal\>2 * 3","PROFILE: 0 data points, 0 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs"," Source File      Lines   T»
icks        %  Source","int: 6"]
rascal>shell(["X = 2 * 3;", "X + 5;"]);
PROFILE: 3 data points, 21 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1      19    90.5%  |prompt:///|(21,8,<1,21>,<1,29
prompt:///          1       1     4.8%  |prompt:///|(0,31,<1,0>,<1,31>
prompt:///          1       1     4.8%  |prompt:///|(0,32,<1,0>,<1,32>
PROFILE: 3 data points, 21 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs
 Source File      Lines   Ticks        %  Source
prompt:///          1      19    90.5%  |prompt:///|(21,8,<1,21>,<1,29
prompt:///          1       1     4.8%  |prompt:///|(0,31,<1,0>,<1,31>
prompt:///          1       1     4.8%  |prompt:///|(0,32,<1,0>,<1,32>
list[str]: ["rascal\>X = 2 * 3;","PROFILE: 0 data points, 0 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs"," Source File      Line»
s   Ticks        %  Source","PROFILE: 0 data points, 0 ticks, tick = 1 milliSecs"," Source File   ...
